        public javax.mail.Session getSmtpSession(OutboundMail outboundMail)
        Create a Simple Mail transfer mail protocol session required for sending mail.
        Parameters:
        outboundMail - keeps details like id, password, host, port and so on. OutboundMail
        Returns:
        smtpSession javax.mail.Session

      • sendMail

        public boolean sendMail(javax.mail.Session smtpSession,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> toList,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> ccList,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> bccList,
               java.lang.String msgSubject,
               java.lang.String msgBody,
               java.io.File file)
                 throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Sends Mail to list of user(to and cc and bcc list) with attachment. send mails via secure socket layer Authentication. Simple mail Transfer Protocol is used.
        Parameters:
        smtpSession - Session see getSmtpSession(com.sanjay.common.dto.OutboundMail).
        toList - List of email-Ids.
        ccList - (Optional) List of email-Ids, can be null.
        bccList - (Optional) List of email-Ids, can be null.
        msgSubject - String subject line of mail.
        msgBody - String TEXT/HTML message to deliver.
        file - (Optional) File to send as attachment.
        Returns:
        boolean true is mail is send otherwise false.
        Throws:
        MessagingException.
        javax.mail.MessagingException
